trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site.
The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.
Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes directly.
These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls.
Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> properties.
For more information about page themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> class.
When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property is abstract.
When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.
A string value containing the relative URL of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> directory.

When overridden in a derived class, gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.ControlSkins%2A> property is abstract.
When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.
Creates a lookup key object for a particular control type and skin ID.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of control to which a control skin applies, which is passed typically from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType"></xref>.
The name of the control skin for which to create a key.
An object that can be used as a lookup key in a dictionary-style collection, which contains the control type and skin ID information.
controlType is `null`.

Uses the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval(System.Object,System.String)"></xref> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page"></xref> property that the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the data item container.
The navigation path from the container to the public property value.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinder"></xref>.
An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

Uses the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval(System.Object,System.String,System.String)"></xref> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page"></xref> property that the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the data item container.
The navigation path from the container to the public property value.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinder"></xref>.
A .NET Framework format string.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinder"></xref>.
A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.
When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of style sheets that are linked to this page.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.LinkedStyleSheets%2A> property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class.
When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.
A string array of style sheets linked to this page.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object that is associated with the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page%2A> property is read-only and is assigned internally when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> class is created.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref>.
Tests whether a device filter applies to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> control that the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> class is associated with.
The string name of the device filter to check.
`true` if deviceFilterName applies to the page; otherwise; `false`.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding xPathExpression.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified format string to display the result.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
A .NET Framework format string to apply to the result.
A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified prefix and namespace mappings for namespace resolution.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
A set of prefix and namespace mappings used for namespace resolution.
An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding xPathExpression.

Uses the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPath(System.String,System.String,System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver)"></xref> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page"></xref> control that the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageTheme"></xref> class is associated with to evaluate an XPath data-binding expression.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPath%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
A .NET Framework format string to apply to the result.
A set of prefix and namespace mappings used for namespace resolution.
A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.
Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression and returns a node collection that implements the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> interface.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPathSelect%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> list of nodes.

Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified prefix and namespace mappings for namespace resolution and returns a node collection that implements the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> interface.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.XPathSelect%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
The XPath expression to evaluate.
For details, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
A set of prefix and namespace mappings used to for namespace resolution.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> list of nodes.
